DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare inpatient outpatient rehabilitation follow total knee arthroplasty . Outpatient rehabilitation provide level quality inpatient care . Thus , assume outpatient rehabilitation non-inferior inpatient standard-of-care therapy .
DOC.brief_title: Inpatient Versus Outpatient Rehabilitation After TKA
DOC.criteria: patient knee osteoarthritis schedule primary TKA age : 5080 BMI > 40 musculoskeletal neurological disorder limit physical function plan joint surgery within 6 month substantial pain functional limitation make patient unable perform study procedure
